text: Luiz Gervazoni (22 May 1907CBF profile - 1963) is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for the Brazil national team. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Carioca (3): :Vasco da Gama: 1929, 1934, 1936 ===National=== * Copa Río Branco (1): :Brazil: 1932 ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Itália (footballer)
